argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nmophm.1 | |- T e. BndLinOp |
| 2 |  | #P_bdopln | |- ( T e. BndLinOp -> T e. LinOp ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_ax-mp | |- T e. LinOp |
| 4 | 3 | #P_lnopmi | |- ( A e. CC -> ( A .op T ) e. LinOp ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_nmophmi | |- ( A e. CC -> ( normop ` ( A .op T ) ) = ( ( abs ` A ) x. ( normop ` T ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_abscl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( abs ` A ) e. RR ) |
| 7 |  | #P_nmopre | |- ( T e. BndLinOp -> ( normop ` T ) e. RR ) |
| 8 | 1, 7 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( normop ` T ) e. RR |
| 9 |  | #P_remulcl | |- ( ( ( abs ` A ) e. RR /\ ( normop ` T ) e. RR ) -> ( ( abs ` A ) x. ( normop ` T ) ) e. RR ) |
| 10 | 6, 8, 9 | #P_sylancl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( abs ` A ) x. ( normop ` T ) ) e. RR ) |
| 11 | 5, 10 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( normop ` ( A .op T ) ) e. RR ) |
| 12 |  | #P_elbdop2 | |- ( ( A .op T ) e. BndLinOp <-> ( ( A .op T ) e. LinOp /\ ( normop ` ( A .op T ) ) e. RR ) ) |
| 13 | 4, 11, 12 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( A e. CC -> ( A .op T ) e. BndLinOp ) |
